languages.text: "А, снова вы! Распоряжение на ваш счет поступило — расчистить проход и пропустить. Вот мы и того-этого — проход расчищаем, мины убираем... Не знаю, зачем вы так на тот свет торопитесь — ну да дело ваше! Ждите. Рано или поздно мы вам ход сделаем".

"Ah, it's you again! An order came down in regard to your esteemed self — we're to clear out a passage and let you through. So here we are — clearing and disarming the mines... I don't know why you're in such a rush to bite it, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."
languages.original_text: "А, снова вы! Распоряжение на ваш счет поступило — расчистить проход и пропустить. Вот мы и того-этого — проход расчищаем, мины убираем... Не знаю, зачем вы так на тот свет торопитесь — ну да дело ваше! Ждите. Рано или поздно мы вам ход сделаем".

I don't know why you're in such a rush to croak, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."

I don't know why you're in such a rush to bite it, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."

I don't know why you're in such a rush to bite it, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."

"Ah, it's you again! An order came down in regard to your esteemed self — we're to clear out a passage and let you through. So here we are — clearing and disarming the mines... I don't know why you're in such a rush to bite it, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."

languages.text: “啊，又是你啊！我们收到了关于你的命令，要求我们清理出一条通道，让你过去。所以，我们正在忙着清理道路、拆除地雷呢……我也不知道你为什么这么急着寻死，不过——呃，反正这也不关我事。好好等着吧，我们迟早会帮你把道路清理好。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, it's you again! An order came down in regard to your esteemed self — we're to clear out a passage and let you through. So here we are — clearing and disarming the mines... I don't know why you're in such a rush to bite it, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: “啊，又是你啊！我们收到了关于你的命令，要求我们清理出一条通道，让你过去。所以，我们正在忙着清理道路、拆除地雷呢……我也不知道你为什么这么急着寻死，不过——呃，反正这也不关我事。好好等着吧，我们迟早会帮你把道路清理好。”

languages.text: «¡Ah, es usted otra vez! Ha llegado una orden de que le dejemos pasar. Tenemos que despejar una ruta y permitirle el paso. Y en ello estamos, despejando y desactivando las minas... No sé por qué tiene tantas ganas de morir, pero... no es asunto mío. Espere un poco y tendremos listo el camino tarde o temprano».
languages.original_text: "Ah, it's you again! An order came down in regard to your esteemed self — we're to clear out a passage and let you through. So here we are — clearing and disarming the mines... I don't know why you're in such a rush to bite it, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah, es usted otra vez! Ha llegado una orden de que le dejemos pasar. Tenemos que despejar una ruta y permitirle el paso. Y en ello estamos, despejando y desactivando las minas... No sé por qué tiene tantas ganas de morir, pero... no es asunto mío. Espere un poco y tendremos listo el camino tarde o temprano».

languages.text: 「あぁ、またお会いしましたね！敬愛する陛下に関する命を受けました…道を片付けて通れるようにしますからね。そこで私共は、地雷を撤去して後始末しています…どうしてそのようにお急ぎかは分かりかねますが…まぁ、私がゴチャゴチャ言うことではありませんね。お待ちいただければ、いずれ私共が通れる道を作りましょう」
languages.original_text: "Ah, it's you again! An order came down in regard to your esteemed self — we're to clear out a passage and let you through. So here we are — clearing and disarming the mines... I don't know why you're in such a rush to bite it, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、またお会いしましたね！敬愛する陛下に関する命を受けました…道を片付けて通れるようにしますからね。そこで私共は、地雷を撤去して後始末しています…どうしてそのようにお急ぎかは分かりかねますが…まぁ、私がゴチャゴチャ言うことではありませんね。お待ちいただければ、いずれ私共が通れる道を作りましょう」

languages.text: "Ah, Ihr seid es wieder! Wir haben einen Befehl bezüglich Eures geschätzten Selbst erhalten – wir sollen einen Weg freimachen und Euch durchlassen. Und das machen wir gerade – freiräumen und Minen entschärfen ... Ich weiß nicht, warum Ihr es so eilig habt, ins Gras zu beißen, aber ... hey, geht mich ja nichts an. Wartet einfach, und früher oder später ist der Weg für Euch frei."
languages.original_text: "Ah, it's you again! An order came down in regard to your esteemed self — we're to clear out a passage and let you through. So here we are — clearing and disarming the mines... I don't know why you're in such a rush to bite it, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Ihr seid es wieder! Wir haben einen Befehl bezüglich Eures geschätzten Selbst erhalten – wir sollen einen Weg freimachen und Euch durchlassen. Und das machen wir gerade – freiräumen und Minen entschärfen ... Ich weiß nicht, warum Ihr es so eilig habt, ins Gras zu beißen, aber ... hey, geht mich ja nichts an. Wartet einfach, und früher oder später ist der Weg für Euch frei."

languages.text: « Ah, vous revoilà ! J'ai reçu un ordre concernant votre honorable personne : on est censés vous dégager un passage et vous laisser passer. Alors voilà, on est en train de déblayer tout ça et de désamorcer les mines... Je sais pas pourquoi vous êtes aussi {mf|pressé|pressée} de mourir, mais bon... C'est pas mes oignons. Patientez un peu, on finira bien par vous ouvrir un chemin. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, it's you again! An order came down in regard to your esteemed self — we're to clear out a passage and let you through. So here we are — clearing and disarming the mines... I don't know why you're in such a rush to bite it, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, vous revoilà ! J'ai reçu un ordre concernant votre honorable personne : on est censés vous dégager un passage et vous laisser passer. Alors voilà, on est en train de déblayer tout ça et de désamorcer les mines... Je sais pas pourquoi vous êtes aussi {mf|pressé|pressée} de mourir, mais bon... C'est pas mes oignons. Patientez un peu, on finira bien par vous ouvrir un chemin. »

languages.text: "Tekrar hoş geldiniz! Geçitlerden birini açıp yüce şahsınızın geçişine izin vermemize dair emir geldi. Biz de bu sebepten mayınları temizliyorduk. Cartayı çekmekteki aceleniz nedir anlamadım, beni alakadar etmez de zaten. Biraz bekleyin, er geç size bir yol açacağız."
languages.original_text: "Ah, it's you again! An order came down in regard to your esteemed self — we're to clear out a passage and let you through. So here we are — clearing and disarming the mines... I don't know why you're in such a rush to bite it, but — eh, it's none of my business. You just wait, and we'll make a way in for you sooner or later."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, tekrar hoş geldiniz! Bir geçidi temizleyip geçmenize izin vermemize dair şahsınıza münhasır bir emir geldi. İşte biz de mayınları temizliyoruz. Cartayı çekmek için aceleniz nedir anlamadım ama meh, beni ilgilendirmez de zaten. Biraz bekleyin, geçidi er ya da geç açacağız."
